REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f1484 reute b f BC-/-FED-SETS-TWO-DAY-SY 06-29 0061

TEXT.TITLE: FED SETS TWO-DAY SYSTEM REPURCHASES
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Reserve entered the government securities market to arrange two-day repurchase agreements for system account, a spokesman for the New York Fed said. Federal funds were trading at 6-3/4 pct at the time of the direct injection of temporary reserves, in line with Friday's 6.72 pct average. Reuter
